element.name: Transferred Patient/Care To/From Agency
element.definition: This element documents the transfer of a patient for care/transport in the field to or from the EMS agency listed in eScene.02.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: No Transfer of Patient/Care To/From Agency

asserts.assert: When Transferred Patient/Care To/From Agency has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When Transferred Patient/Care To/From Agency is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
